forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing this afternoon. High 18C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy and windy with showers developing this afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
